bugs.title: CVE-2017-10799 GraphicsMagick: out of memory in ReadDPXImage() function

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2017-10799 GraphicsMagick: out of memory in ReadDPXImage() function

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in GraphicsMagick 1.3.25. When a DPX image is processed (with metadata indicating a large width) in coders/dpx.c, an out of memory denial of service can occur in ReadDPXImage().

Upstream patch:

http://hg.code.sf.net/p/graphicsmagick/code/rev/f10b9bb3ca62

Created GraphicsMagick tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1467373]

Created GraphicsMagick tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-all [bug 1467382]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

bugs.title: CVE-2017-10800 GraphicsMagick: out of memory in ReadMATImage() function

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2017-10800 GraphicsMagick: out of memory in ReadMATImage() function

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in GraphicsMagick 1.3.25. When a MATLAB image is processed in coders/mat.c, it can lead to a out of memory denial of service in ReadMATImage() if the size specified in metadata for a MAT Object is larger than the actual amount of data.

Upstream patch:

http://hg.code.sf.net/p/graphicsmagick/code/rev/e5761e3a2012

Created GraphicsMagick tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1467379]

Created GraphicsMagick tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-all [bug 1467381]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2017-10800 GraphicsMagick: out of memory in ReadMATImage() function

http://hg.code.sf.net/p/graphicsmagick/code/rev/e5761e3a2012

bugs.title: CVE-2017-10794 GraphicsMagick: buffer overflow in QuantumTransferMode

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2017-10794 GraphicsMagick: buffer overflow in QuantumTransferMode

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in GraphicsMagick 1.3.25. When an RGB TIFF picture is processed (with metadata indicating a single sample per pixel) in coders/tiff.c, a buffer overflow occurs, related to QuantumTransferMode.

Upstream patch:

http://hg.code.sf.net/p/graphicsmagick/code/rev/a20bee0a0ad2

External References:

https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2017-10794

Created GraphicsMagick tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: epel-all [bug 1467656]
Affects: fedora-all [bug 1467657]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.
